metas.title: PapyMovie | Stop forgetting the movies you watch
metas.description: Start rating and storing your best movies. Discover new movies by following friends or people with same interest.

header.title: Stop forgetting the movies you watch.
header.subtitle: Start rating and storing your best movies.

subheader.title: our goals
subheader.subtitle: We all love movies. Start saving the best you watched to never forget about them.

features.content1: Add your own mark and description to your favorite movies to never forget about them.
features.content2: Filter, discover the trends and top rated movies of all time.
features.content3: Watch your friends movies or people share the same interests.
